name: Ext.chart.legend.SpriteLegend
doc:
This class uses Ext.draw.sprite.Sprite to render the chart legend.

The DOM legend is essentially a data view docked inside a draw container, which a chart is. The sprite legend, on the other hand, is not a foreign entity in a draw container, and is rendered in a draw surface with sprites, just like series and axes.

This means that:

  • it is styleable with chart themes
  • it shows up in chart preview and chart download
  • it renders markers exactly as they are in the series
  • it can't be styled with CSS
  • it doesn't scroll, instead the items are grouped into columns, and the legend grows in size as the number of items increases

members.name: background
members.doc: Sets the legend background. This can be a gradient object, image, or color. This config works similarly to the Ext.chart.AbstractChart.background config.

members.name: border
members.doc: The border that goes around legend item sprites. The type of the sprite is determined by this config, while the styling comes from a theme #legend. If both this config and the theme provide values for the same configs, the values from this config are used. The sprite class used a legend border should have the isLegendBorder property set to true on the prototype. The legend border sprite should also have the x, y, width and height attributes that determine it's position and dimensions.
members.short_doc: The border that goes around legend item sprites. ...

members.name: chart
members.doc: The chart that the store belongs to.

members.name: docked
members.doc: The position of the legend in the chart.
members.short_doc: The position of the legend in the chart. ...

members.name: hidden
members.short_doc: Toggles the visibility of the legend. ...

members.name: marker
members.doc: The sprite to use as a legend item marker. By default a corresponding series marker is used. If the series has no marker, the circle sprite is used as a legend item marker, where its fillStyle, strokeStyle and lineWidth match that of the series. The size of a legend item marker is controlled by the size property, which to defaults to 10 (pixels).
members.short_doc: The sprite to use as a legend item marker. ...

members.name: padding
members.doc: The padding amount between legend items and legend border.
members.short_doc: The padding amount between legend items and legend border. ...

members.name: size
members.doc: The size of the area occupied by the legend's sprites. This is set by the legend itself and then used during chart layout to make sure the 'legend' surface is big enough to accommodate legend sprites.
members.short_doc: The size of the area occupied by the legend's sprites. ...

members.name: store
members.doc: The Ext.chart.legend.store.Store to bind this legend to.

members.name: surface
members.doc: The chart surface used to render legend sprites.

members.name: toggleable
members.doc: true to allow series items to have their visibility toggled by interaction with the legend items.
members.short_doc:
true to allow series items to have their visibility
toggled by interaction with the legend items. ...

members.name: dockedValues
members.default: {left: true, right: true, top: true, bottom: true}

members.name: computeRect
members.doc: Calculates and returns the legend surface rect and adjusts the passed chartRect accordingly. The first time this is called, the SpriteLegend will have zero size (no width or height).

params.name: chartRect
params.doc: [left, top, width, height] components as an array.

return.name: return
return.doc: [left, top, width, height] components as an array, or null.

members.short_doc:
Calculates and returns the legend surface rect and adjusts the passed chartRect
accordingly. ...

members.name: createSprite
members.doc: Creates a 'legenditem' sprite in the given surface using the legend store record data provided.
members.short_doc:
Creates a 'legenditem' sprite in the given surface
using the legend store record data provided. ...

members.name: getSprites
members.doc: Doesn't include the border sprite which also belongs to the 'legend' surface. To get it, use the 'getBorder' method.
members.short_doc:
Doesn't include the border sprite which also belongs to the 'legend'
surface. ...

members.name: updateSprite
members.doc: Updates the given legend item sprite based on store record data.
members.short_doc: Updates the given legend item sprite based on store record data. ...

members.name: updateSprites
members.doc: Creates legend item sprites and associates them with legend store records. Updates attributes of the sprites when legend store data changes.
members.short_doc: Creates legend item sprites and associates them with legend store records. ...

short_doc: This class uses Ext.draw.sprite.Sprite to render the chart legend. ...
